Package location

Class User

java.lang.Object
location.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user.

      public User(String login, String password, PersonalInformation personalInformation)
      Constructs a new User with the specified login and personal information.

      login - the login identifier for the user
      password - the password of the user
      personalInformation - the personal information of the user

      the reviews of the user

    • register

      public static User register(String username, String password, PersonalInformation info)
      User registration. The chosen username must not already exist among the registered users.
      Parameters:
      username - the (unique) username of the user
      password - the user's password (must not be empty or null)
      info - personal information about the user
      Returns:
      a code specifying the result of the registration: 0 if the registration was successful, 1 if the username was already used, 2 if the username or password was empty, 3 if the personal information was not properly specified

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Adds a reservation to the user's list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to be added
      Throws:
      RentingException - if the reservation is null
      RentingException - if the reservation already exists in the list
      RentingException - if the user already has 3 reservations

    • cancelReservation

      public void cancelReservation(Reservation reservation)
      Cancels the given reservation by removing it from the user's list of reservations and dissociating the user from the reservation.
      Parameters:
      reservation - the reservation to be canceled

    • resetUsers

      public static void resetUsers()
      Resets the collection of users to an empty HashSet. This method clears all existing users and initializes a new empty set.

    • resetReservations

      public void resetReservations()
      Resets the user's reservations by initializing a new empty HashSet. This method clears all existing reservations.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the reference object with which to compare.
      Returns:
      true if this object is the same as the obj argument; false otherwise.
